details.description: Position: We are seeking a highly motivated and skilled SEO Specialist to join our team on a part-time basis. The successful candidate will enhance our online presence and optimize our website to attract and engage potential clients. This is a remote position with working hours from 9 AM to 5 PM EST. Responsibilities:  Develop and implement effective SEO strategies to improve our search engine rankings.  Perform regular keyword research and competitive analysis.  Optimize website, including blogs, articles, and service pages.  Monitor and analyze website performance using SEO tools and analytics.  Provide strategic direction and guidance on marketing initiatives.  Collaborate with the social media manager to ensure cohesive and effective strategy implementation.  Stay updated with the latest SEO trends and best practices.  Qualifications:  Proven experience as an SEO Specialist or similar role.  In-depth knowledge of SEO practices, keyword research, and Google Analytics.  Strong analytical skills and ability to interpret data.  Excellent written and verbal communication skills.  Familiarity with the legal industry is a plus but, not necessary.  Ability to provide strategic direction and collaborate effectively with team members.  What We Offer:  Salary based on experience.  Flexible working hours.  Remote work arrangement.  Opportunity to work with a dedicated and supportive team.  Professional growth and development opportunities. Banxe.com is seeking a detail-oriented and dynamic Project Manager for our IT department. The ideal candidate will oversee the invoicing process, manage tasks, and coordinate sprints across four different units. This role requires exceptional organizational skills, a strong understanding of project management methodologies, and the ability to work collaboratively with multiple teams. Key Responsibilities: Sprint Planning and Execution:  Plan and organize sprints in collaboration with unit leads.  Define sprint goals, backlogs, and timelines.  Conduct sprint planning meetings and retrospectives.  Ensure sprints are executed efficiently, meeting deadlines and quality standards.  Task Management:  Create, assign, and prioritize tasks for team members across different units.  Use project management tools (JIRA) to track and report task statuses.  Facilitate regular check-ins and updates with team members to ensure alignment and progress.  Invoicing Management:  Coordinate with finance and accounting departments to ensure accurate and timely invoicing.  Track and reconcile invoices against project budgets and timelines.  Cross-Unit Coordination:  Facilitate communication and collaboration between the four different units.  Ensure alignment of goals, timelines, and resources across units.  Address and resolve any inter-unit conflicts or dependencies.  Stakeholder Management:  Engage with internal and external stakeholders to gather requirements and provide updates.  Manage stakeholder expectations and ensure project deliverables meet their needs.  Prepare and present project reports and updates to senior management.  Qualifications:  Minimum of 3 years of experience in project management, preferably within an IT department.  Strong understanding of project management methodologies (Agile, Scrum, Waterfall).  Proficiency with project management tools (e.g., JIRA, Trello, Asana).  Excellent organizational and multitasking skills.  Strong communication and interpersonal skills.  Ability to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams.  PMP, PRINCE2, or similar project management certification is a plus.  What We Offer:  Competitive salary and benefits package.  100% Remote  Opportunities for professional growth and development.  A collaborative and innovative work environment.  The chance to work on exciting and impactful projects in fintech.

Job Description This role is currently available in the following shift.  Monday ‚Äî Friday, 2 PM ‚Äî 11 PM  if you are working evening shift (2pm to 11 pm) from the office, working hours are adjusted because of the curfew to 1pm-10pm  Now we work from the safest place of our choosing (office or home), however we treasure face-to-face communication and plan to get back to the offices as soon as we can. As a Customer Care Expert, you will be an integral part of Wix‚Äôs relationship with our users. You will serve as a subject matter expert and should have a technical savvy and true understanding of the Wix product offering. You will:  Work with users to determine their needs and help them reach their business goals and enhance their online presence.  Manage email, phone, chat, and/or other communication channels as a primary contact for Wix users.  Introduce Wix users to our different tools, services and products they can benefit from, and help onboard them where appropriate.  Be an advocate for our technical products and services, being able to explain their functionality and value  Regularly converse with and support experienced Wix designers and agencies  Develop expertise in Wix products and stay up to date with new features and improvements.  Work with other departments and product teams, and advocate our users' needs to impact product roadmaps.  Analyze user behavior and relevance to determine their effect on user satisfaction.  Qualifications:  You are fluent in English (verbal and written) and based in Kyiv or Lviv (or nearby areas).  You are a customer service professional with at least 2 years of experience working in a client-facing role.  You‚Äôre able to digest information quickly and relay it in an easily understandable way.  You find meaning and pleasure in helping others succeed and are curious to know what really drives users.  You have strong critical thinking skills and are confident about taking responsibility and ownership.  You hold yourself to high performance standards and work to improve constantly.  You‚Äôre passionate about new technologies and always eager to learn more.  You thrive in a fast-paced, dynamic environment and look at change as an opportunity to grow.  You realize there is more than one career ladder, and you have the drive to find your own career path recognizing your strengths and interests.  Bonus points if you have experience working for a tech or at an internet company!  About the team We are Wix‚Äôs Customer Care Guild. We‚Äôre not your typical customer support. We represent the Wix user‚Äôs voice and work closely with the Product to deeply understand Wix technologies and services. As part of our global organization of Customer Care, we‚Äôre responsible for building solid relationships with Wix users, uncovering their business needs, and guiding them to success. Working with us, you‚Äôll find a friendly atmosphere, fantastic coworkers, and diverse growth opportunities in a dynamic environment. We‚Äôre spread across the globe and offer an office, remote, or hybrid work model depending on the site. About Wix: Wix makes it possible for anyone to succeed online. Since 2006, we‚Äôve grown to 5,000 employees in 17 countries, launched over 40 products, and serve over 230 million users and their visitors worldwide. At Wix, we push you to innovate, evolve in non-traditional ways, and grow outside your comfort zone. We operate in small teams that work closely together to create incredible things. We‚Äôre proud to be an equal opportunity employer. Wix was built around the idea that everyone has the right to be successful, online. This same vision defines us as an employer: creating a work environment where everyone is welcome, and anyone has the right to succeed.

And regardless of whether you are just starting your career or are already a pro ‚Äî we believe you can be the transformation. Are you ready? Logistics Freight Analyst (f/m/d) From Ukraine ‚Äî remote If you are interested in this position and match above-stated requirements, please press Apply here ‚Äî Rate Maintenance Specialist Freight Audit | Ukraine ‚Äî (Transporeon) | Trimble  and follow the quick application instructions. WebbyLab is a Ukrainian IT outsourcing company. We develop scalable and feature-rich Web and Mobile applications using NodeJs, React, React Native, PHP stack. We have successfully completed projects for Daimler Mercedes-Benz, Bayer, Pfizer, Uber, Ezlo, etc. Currently, our company consists of more than 100 first-rate specialists. Our objective is to enhance our team with even more exceptional talents who will embrace our values, inspire others, and grow alongside us as we work towards achieving all our goals. In order to strengthen our team, we are looking for an IT Project manager who is ready to dive into the subject area, understand the architectural solutions of the technical team and communicate it to the customer if necessary, strike a balance between the goals of the business and the client, provide a quality product on time and follow web development trends. It‚Äôs great if you have experience with healthcare, e-commerce, fintech, or IoT projects. Your skill set:  2+ years of work experience as an IT Project manager;  Experience in project planning from scratch;  Experience of participating in B2C, B2B products for web or mobile applications;  Understanding of project management tools and processes;  Experience in using various task tracking systems (JIRA, ClickUp, Redmine);  Understanding of the methodologies and life cycle of software development;  Registration of technical specifications (building models, processes and structures, prototypes of the user interface, scenarios of use);  Risk analysis, analysis of problem areas and proposals for their improvement;  Drawing up requirements for the product;  Maintenance of software development life cycle;  Interaction with a team of programmers and testers during product development;  Experience with foreign clients;  Upper Intermediate English.  Would be a plus:  Technical background (developer, QA);  Experience in fintech projects;  Basic knowledge of software architecture;  Experience in managing multiple projects and teams at the same time.  Responsibilities:  Maintain project documentation;  Negotiate with the customer and carry out stand-ups, status meetings with the team;  Make plans and project assessments;  Break down projects into tasks, prioritize and distribute them among the team;  Track the progress of tasks, the status of projects;  Track team and customer satisfaction;  Provide the customer with reports on the progress of the project;  Present demo versions and solutions to the customer;  Participate in the recruiting process of new team members.  Our benefits:  Challenging tasks and continuous professional growth and feedback;  Want to upgrade your skills? No problem, WebbyLab is ready to compensate for your training, conferences, courses, etc.;  Internal pieces of training, hackathons, demo presentations of our projects;  English courses and a Speaking Club with the native speaker;  An opportunity to take part in writing technical articles and receive remuneration;  Access to a corporate library and consultations with our IT specialists;  Flexible working schedule and type of work (remote);  Paid vacation of 20 working days, sick leave;  Gifts and bonuses for your birthday, WebbyLab‚Äôs birthday, and New Year‚Äôs holidays.  Please indicate the salary expectations, detailed description of your experience, skills, contact details in the CV/cover letter. Note: our recruiting team will consider your application and will contact you if your experience and qualifications align with the role. If you do not receive a response, don‚Äôt worry, it means we have kept your resume on file for future opportunities.

Smart Tek Solutions is a leading IT service provider serving Fortune 500 companies in the US. Our goal is to become a leading employer in Europe, and we are now looking for a talented and experienced Junior/Middle Odoo Engineer to join our dynamic team. Responsibilities:  Develop new modules into the Odoo ERP on one project;  End to End implementation of the Odoo ERP system as per the business needs;  Customize and maintain existing modules of the Odoo ERP on one project;  Working with the existing Odoo team.  Requirements:  Solid experience with ERP/Odoo;  Good programming skills;  Good problem-solving and debugging skills;  Clear-cut understanding of object-oriented programming concepts;  Ability to create new modules;  Ability to customize existing core modules and add/remove additional features in it;  Must have the ability to write/create/implement complex business logic in the backend;  Knowledge of the latest trends and technologies and the ability to integrate new things within Odoo;  Ability and flexibility in learning new things and delivering productive work on them;  Must have sound knowledge of Odoo MVC architecture;  Shall have worked in and have Good functional knowledge of business concepts like Inventory, eCommerce, Manufacturing, Accounting, CRM, Purchasing, Sales, Barcode, Human resources, and Financial reporting;  Must have strong technical & functional knowledge of Odoo core modules such as Sales, Purchase, Inventory, Accounting, Manufacturing, Qweb Reporting, Barcode, e-commerce, and Marketing Automation;  Should have knowledge of Odoo installation;  Independent thinking with keen problem-solving skills;  Extensive knowledge and understanding of Business processes & System architecture;  Must have good experience translating business requirements and design into technical solutions;  Sound knowledge of version control system tools like git and its tools available in the market, such as handling Docker, Github, and Bitbucket;  Ability to research, learn, troubleshoot, debug and support complex Odoo customizations, integrating Odoo with third-party REST API;  Should have knowledge of Database tuning to achieve high performance;  Willing to learn, operate and progress in the domain areas that are outside previous job experience.  Will be a plus:  Analytic skills;  Experience in writing unit testing and test case automation;  Knowledge of Odoo. sh;  Demonstrated experience in the development of Technical/Functional documentation;  Knowledge of the Odoo UI JS framework.  We offer:  Variety of domains;  Full stack of technologies;  Professional and highly interactive team environment;  Management style based on openness and trust;  Stable support in personal education and growth;  Worthy compensation;  Active community with regular knowledge sharing;  Flexible work conditions;  Huge office with extra space for work & leisure.

Oxford Biolabs is a pioneering company in the field of proprietary food supplements and cosmetics focused on addressing hair loss, skin aging, immunity, and overall aging. Founded by experts from the University of Oxford, we have been providing science-backed, naturally-based products since 2009. We have a well-established office and team in Lviv, Ukraine, since 2013, which is unique for a foreign company in the region. Our Lviv team is stable and has been an integral part of our long-term success. Job Description: We are seeking a dynamic and results-driven PPC Manager to join our marketing team. The ideal candidate will have a proven track record in managing successful PPC campaigns across various platforms, driving significant ROI, and contributing to the growth of our brand. This role will report directly to the Marketing Manager and work closely with the Campaign Manager. Requirements:  Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field.  Minimum of 3 years experience in PPC campaign management.  Proven track record of managing successful PPC campaigns with a high ROI.  Proficiency in Google Ads, Bing Ads, Meta Ads (Facebook and Instagram and Youtube), LinkedIn Ads, TikTok Ads, and Amazon Sponsored Ads.  Experience with additional advertising platforms such as eBay is a plus.  Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret data and provide actionable insights.  Excellent written and verbal communication skills.  Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced environment.  Familiarity with tools such as Google Analytics, SEMrush, and similar.  Responsibilities:  Develop, implement, and manage PPC campaigns across Google Ads, Bing Ads, Meta Ads (Facebook and Instagram), LinkedIn Ads, TikTok Ads, and Amazon Sponsored Ads.  Explore and manage additional advertising opportunities on platforms such as eBay and other relevant marketplaces.  Monitor and analyze campaign performance, making data-driven adjustments to optimize for maximum ROI.  Conduct keyword research and selection for pay-per-click campaigns.  Write compelling ad copy and design effective landing pages to increase conversion rates.  Collaborate with the Campaign Manager to ensure cohesive strategies across email, postal, and other marketing channels.  Manage budgets, bid strategies, and performance metrics to ensure cost-effective spending.  Generate detailed performance reports and provide actionable insights for continuous improvement.  Stay up-to-date with industry trends, best practices, and competitive landscape.  What We Offer:  Competitive base salary.  Performance-based bonuses with high earning potential.  Flexible working hours and remote work options.  Opportunity to work with a leading brand in the nutraceutical and cosmeceutical industry.  Professional development and growth opportunities. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. Join us at Oxford Biolabs and be a part of a team that is transforming the nutraceutical and cosmeceutical industry through innovative, science-backed products.

ABOUT The HALO Trust is the world‚Äôs largest humanitarian demining organization. HALO is a non-governmental, non-political, non-religious organization headquartered in the UK. HALO‚Äôs mission is to protect lives and restore the livelihoods of those affected by conflict. We clear landmines and the explosive debris of war so communities and countries can recover. HALO is an equal opportunities employer, and will not discriminate against any candidate on the basis of age, sex, ethnicity, religion, or any other characteristic. All recruitment is conducted in a transparent manner, with selection made solely on the basis of ability. Women and people with disabilities are encouraged to apply. HALO Ukraine has been operating since 2016, delivering humanitarian mine action activities, including survey, mine clearance and explosive ordnance risk education. The programme currently employs approximately 1100 staff members. HALO Ukraine is responding to the humanitarian crisis in the country and seeking a competent Imagery Analyst to support our efforts.  JOB TITLE : Imagery Analyst LOCATION : Mykolaiv Oblast REPORTING  TO : Remote Sensing Manager  The HALO Trust is currently recruiting for an Imagery Analyst to support its work clearing landmines and unexploded ordnance in Ukraine. The position will initially be a temporary three-month contract with the opportunity to transfer to a full-time role, depending on performance. The Imagery Analyst will process and analyse imagery from a range of remote sensing sources and produce information products for use by HALO‚Äôs clearance and survey teams in the field. The post holder will also be involved in a number of research and development projects. The role is primarily office based but can include some limited field work.  Responsibilities :  Acquire and process satellite imagery from a range of providers for end use by field teams across a number of platforms.  Analyse satellite imagery to identify points of interest and annotate in HALO‚Äôs information management system.  Process UAV sensor data (optical, thermal, multispectral, lidar) to provide ortho-mosaics and other information products.  Conduct quality control checks of collected data and submit into HALO`s information management systems.  Collaborate with the research and development team to develop remote sensing capture and processing capabilities.   Requirements :  University degree in Remote Sensing, Geodesic Surveying ,GIS, cartography or related fields. Or relevant, equivalent experience analysing imagery (including military or intelligence contexts).  At least 2 years of relevant professional experience.  Experience of using photogrammetry techniques.  Experience of processing satellite and UAV sensor data for display on online and offline maps and building tile layers for online hosting.  Ability to think critically.  Initiative and proactivity.  High communication skills.  Strong problem-solving skills and ability to innovate.   Desirable :  English language skills (desirable).  Experience using Pix4D for processing of UAV imagery.  Familiarity with the Esri suite of products, especially ArcGIS Pro and ArcGIS Enterprise.  Experience processing data from different remote sensors (optical, thermal, multispectral, lidar).  Experience using Python or other programming languages to automate workflows in ArcGIS.  Terms and Conditions Working hours: Monday to Friday, 08:00‚Äî17:00, one hour lunch break (40 hours per week) Willing to travel to task sites Salary: competitive, dependent upon experience Annual title: Senior specialist, Supervisor in IT Assurance in Audit

details.description: KPMG is a global network of professional firms providing Audit, Tax and Advisory services. KPMG is the brand under which the member firms of KPMG International Limited (¬´KPMG International¬ª) operate and provide professional services. ¬´KPMG¬ª is used to refer to individual member firms within the KPMG organization or to one or more member firms collectively. We operate in 143 countries and territories, and collectively employed more than 273,000 people working in member firms around the world. Each firm is an independent legal entity. Each KPMG member firm is solely responsible for its own obligations. KPMG is committed to three key imperatives: quality of services, insight into the problems of our clients, and integrity in our business. It is these principles that drive our firms professionals to provide audit, tax, and advisory services that reflect global consistency and unwavering integrity. We will build and sustain our reputation as the best firm to work with by ensuring that our people, our clients and our communities achieve their full potential. KPMG Ukraine is building a local IT audit practice in the audit department and is looking for IT auditors having all levels of experience to join our team. Our future colleague is required to have good technical skills and fluent English. You will have a great opportunity to implement your knowledge and skills in practice, helping to address real business challenges. As part of our team, you will have a chance to learn about the processes, systems and strategies of the largest companies operating in the Ukrainian and international markets. Here you will enjoy a pleasant working atmosphere, personal professional development and competitive terms of cooperation. Function:  supervising and conducting IT audits as part of financial statement audits (including PCAOB, SOX);  identification of IT risks and controls;  testing IT controls, including access to the IT environment and data, user management, change management and computer operations;  testing interfaces and data flows between IT systems;  testing automated controls;  analysis of large data sets using IT tools;  evaluating and testing the control system (mainly IT) in the provision of assurance services on controls in service organizations (ISAE 3402, SOC1);  documenting the deliverables and reporting the results according to the agreed schedule;  training junior colleagues, managing a group of IT auditors, actively cooperating with audit teams, clients' management and IT personnel  What you should have :   at least 2 years of experience in IT audit, IT security or IT systems administration;  university degreein IT, Economics, Internal Audit / IT is preferred  understanding of the IT environment, including database management systems (MS SQL, Oracle, others are welcome) and operating systems (MS Windows, Unix/Linux, others are welcome)  knowledge in IT processes, including logical access control and software development methods;  basic knowledge of SQL;  good command of English (oral and written);  good command of MS Office (in particular, MS Excel)  Additional advantages will be:   experience in providing assurance services in service organizations (ISAE 3402, SOC1, SOC2, SOC3);  CISA, CRISC, CGEIT, COBIT, ISO/IEC 27001, ITIL Foundation certificates  We offer:  professional growth in a team of like-minded people, an opportunity to implement your own projects;  transparent career and professional development path;  a wide range of training programs for acquiring unique experience in the field of IT audit, participation in international projects;  competitive salary and flexible bonus system based on performance; title: Specialist in IT Assurance in Audit

details.description: KPMG is a global network of professional firms providing Audit, Tax and Advisory services. KPMG is the brand under which the member firms of KPMG International Limited (¬´KPMG International¬ª) operate and provide professional services. ¬´KPMG¬ª is used to refer to individual member firms within the KPMG organization or to one or more member firms collectively. We operate in 143 countries and territories, and collectively employed more than 273,000 people working in member firms around the world. Each firm is an independent legal entity. Each KPMG member firm is solely responsible for its own obligations. KPMG is committed to three key imperatives: quality of services, insight into the problems of our clients, and integrity in our business. It is these principles that drive our firms professionals to provide audit, tax, and advisory services that reflect global consistency and unwavering integrity. We will build and sustain our reputation as the best firm to work with by ensuring that our people, our clients and our communities achieve their full potential. KPMG Ukraine is building a local IT audit practice in the audit department and is looking for IT auditors having all levels of experience to join our team. Our future colleague is required to have good technical skills and fluent English. You will have a great opportunity to implement your knowledge and skills in practice, helping to address real business challenges. As part of our team, you will have a chance to learn about the processes, systems and strategies of the largest companies operating in the Ukrainian and international markets. Project-based activities will provide a variety and flexibility of tasks and responsibilities. Here you will enjoy a pleasant working atmosphere, personal professional development and competitive terms of cooperation. Function:  conducting IT audits for audit clients (including PCAOB, SOX)  general testing of the IT environment of companies (ITGC testing)  analysis of business processes supported by IT systems, business process testing  identification and analysis of IT risks  testing of business and IT controls  analysis of IT solutions for compliance with legislation and best practices  analysis of large data sets  What you should have:  higher education or second master‚Äôs degree status (preferably subjects related to IT, internal audit, finance, use of IT tools in business, quantitative methods). For candidates for junior specialist ‚Äî higher education in the process of obtaining is acceptable  interest in topics related to modern technology and economics  ability to effectively search for and analyze information  ability to work with data, perform calculations and analysis using IT tools and draw logical conclusions  English language skills (oral and written) at B2 level and above  teamwork skills, ability to organize work, motivation to develop  experience in implementing IT audit services for more experienced candidates for senior positions  We offer:  professional growth in a team of like-minded people, an opportunity to implement your own projects;  transparent career and professional development path;  a wide range of training programs for acquiring unique experience in the field of IT audit, participation in international projects;  competitive salary and flexible bonus system based on performance;  medical insurance. Our company ‚Äî one of the top players in the US logistics market ‚Äî is expanding and looking to recruit new specialists. If you want to earn extra income and contribute to our ongoing success, this job offer is perfect for you! We are currently in the exciting phase of developing our own CRM system. To ensure its success, we seek an experienced Senior Web Developer to provide independent consultation to our IT Department . This is a unique opportunity to work on a significant project, and our HR manager will be glad to provide you with more details during the interview if you have any questions. Work Schedule : Flexible Employment : Part-time Salary : The base salary is based on an hourly rate of $30/hour. There are no fixed work hours; we will contact you when we need your consultation or assistance. Job Type : remote Requirements:  Minimum 5 years of experience in web developing;  Upper-intermediate proficiency in English;  Extensive expertise in Web developing;  Thorough understanding of database design and implementation;  Profound understanding of advanced architectural principles, both theoretical and practical;  Hands-on experience with one of top frameworks  Ability to design with a focus on both technical and business perspectives;  Comprehensive knowledge of the entire web stack and its impact on performance and reliability;  Strong commitment to delivering high-quality, efficient, and performance-driven solutions;  Proven experience in taking ownership of projects or tasks.  Experience in a Cyber Security  Responsibilities:  Provide expert guidance and consultation to the IT Department on Web development best practices and methodologies;  Architect, design, and implement robust and scalable Web-based solutions for our CRM system;  Collaborate closely with the IT team to understand project requirements, define technical solutions, and ensure alignment with business goals;  Foster a collaborative and knowledge-sharing environment within the team;  Conduct code reviews, recommend improvements, and meet code quality, performance, and security standards;  Troubleshoot and resolve complex technical issues related to Web development and integration within the CRM system;  Stay updated with industry trends, new technologies, and best practices to improve development processes and outcomes continuously.  Assist in creating a secure system, testing it against hacking vulnerabilities, and assist with penetration testing.  If you are interested in this offer, apply for the position below.

SKELAR is a venture builder that builds international product IT companies, where we recreated the venture capital world. Together with our co-founders, we gather strong teams to kick off and run tech businesses and win at global markets. Brighterly is the EdTech startup that created a platform for children studying math in the USA. A well-coordinated, experienced team of 40+ people has a successful experience in creating an EdTech business aimed at adults. Now we are making confident steps in the niche for children and teach kids from 6 to 12 years old to add, multiply, divide, and understand algebra and geometry. It‚Äôs all in engaging form, on the top personalized resources with professional tutors. For the first 2 years, we already have more than 1500 clients , who use Brighterly‚Äôs service. Our aim for this year is to scale and take the leading place in the Ed-Tech business market. To reach that, we need to sell a lot! That is why we are opening the role of a Sales Manager. We are looking for Sales Managers of all grades with an Advanced level of English, who are ready to work on the USA market in a B2C sphere, only incoming requests. We offer the strong expertise of colleagues, a chance to grow fast, regular feedback, a flexible schedule, and the opportunity to work remotely. Our HR team cares about you, so you will go through onboarding comfortably and fast. Our Sales team will help you to understand all the rules and regulations so you will adapt to working in a new team in the shortest time. The working schedule has evening and night shifts from 18:00 to 02:00 and from 23:00 to 06:00. About you: ‚Äî 6 months+ of sales experience; ‚Äî High level of empathy (active listening, candidate can hear and attract the customer); ‚Äî High level of intelligence (clear speech, no long pauses, building difficult sentences, jokes); ‚Äî Energetic nature (candidate sounds lively); persistence and result orientation; ‚Äî English level: B2-C1; ‚Äî Experience in working with clients online or offline; ‚Äî Willingness and readiness to work in a team. Nice to have: Basic sales techniques; ‚Äî Experience of working with CRM. We offer: ‚Äî Skilled professional team that shares knowledge and supports each other; ‚Äî Regular feedback about the work; ‚Äî Working schedule: flexible shifts ; ‚Äî Competitive salary + bonuses ; ‚Äî Health insurance; ‚Äî Corporate psychologist. Click Apply to Position and join the team!

IMPORTANT! Relevant as of July 5, 2024, 1 month internship. Would you like to work with TOP technical stack? Would you like to learn from colleagues with broad expertise? Do you want to get off the treadmill and develop your skills? So, complete the test assignment, pass a couple of interviews and go through a month internship period and you‚Äôll open the door to new opportunities. It is not going to be easy, we require employees to work hard and develop their skills at a fast pace. Complex and interesting projects and our experienced and friendly team are waiting for you in our company. All our clients are foreign companies (EU/US/etc.), that‚Äôs why (at least) basic English knowledge is required. We specialize in development of custom web applications, websites and browser extensions. You will work closely with other front-end developers, back-end developers, QA engineers, designers, PMs and other employees. Our PM will make every effort to make you feel comfortable working in the company. The company has introduced an PDP (Personal Development Plan) for each employee. Our full-time English teacher will provide support and improve your English skills. By clicking on the link (company name) in the vacancy header, you can find brief information about our company, video, photos, contacts of the HR manager and a link to our website. Why we‚Äôre seeking new team members Due to our company‚Äôs growth and the successful conclusion of new contracts for the year 2024, we are actively searching for talented and motivated professionals ready to join our team. Currently, 1 vacancy is open. Test assignment  Build a responsive page with 3 blocks, implement 1 POST and 1 GET request.  The Company may, at its sole discretion, not provide applicants with the reason for being rejected and technical details of the test completed.  Once getting to the 3rd stage of the interview, the candidate will have the opportunity to receive a feedback from a technical specialist regarding your test assignment including technical details.  Link to the test task: https://drive.google.com/file/d/11XPGP9wrHB-B5aLlBCRLXHVA2yvM2QhY/view?usp=sharing  Our working conditions  Our offices are well equipped for power outages: gasoline generator, EcoFlow Delta portable power station provides electricity for devices and standby lightning, Fiber optic internet provider, Starlink provide access to the internet.  First month will be a paid internship period.  Internship period paid as fixed monthly payment in UAH.  Always stable and on time salary.  We work officially (Private Entrepreneur by contract);  Salary is calculated in $/h, with loads of 160 to 200 or more hours per month (all spent time is paid);  Additionally: company pays Bench as 75% from rate and FuckUp pays as 50% from rate.  Revision of the hourly rate every six months up to +50% (according to company regulations).  Quarterly bonus, project performance based.  English classes 2 times per week (groups of two people, after work hours).  MacBook Pro 14/16, 4K monitor, stand, mouse, keyboard, headphones, comfortable chair, company branded T-shirt and mug.  Working day from 8:00 to 17:00 (The plan for the day is made at the stand-up meeting and must be accomplished (considering common sense) within the day according to the checkpoints. After accepting the work, the PM finalizes the working day).  Breakfast, lunches and other things in the kitchen at the expense of the company (coffee, tea, cookies, sweets, yogurts and drinks in the refrigerator).  Work in one of 5 our offices (5‚àí15 minutes walking distance from metro station):  –ö1 (–ú) Pozniaky  –ö2 (–ú) Lukianivska/Kontraktova Square  –ö3 (–ú) Taras Shevchenko  –ö4 (–ú) Osokorky  –ö5 (–ú) Slavutych   Requirements  Knowledge of HTML5 and CSS3 (fixed width, adaptive and responsive layout, pixel perfect markup)  1‚àí2 years experience;  Experience with Twitter Bootstrap ¬æ or Google Material Design;  Experience with at least one CSS-preprocessor (Stylus, Sass, Less) or PostCSS;  Figma, Zeplin and/or Avocode;  Knowledge of Javascript, HTML document DOM model and events;  Experience with React or Vue;  Experience with Webpack;  GIT knowledge;  Experience in server configuration (nginx), CI/CD, Websockets, CDN and other modern frontend/web technologies is a big plus;  Ability to quickly search for information in the internet (googling);  Passion to continuously learn new technologies and be up to date with the technologies you already know (HTML5, Javascript, etc.).  Current Technology Stack  PHP projects: LAMP/LEMP, Laravel 5‚àí8+;  NodeJS: NestJS, TypeORM, etc.;  Other technologies: PostgreSQL, MongoDB, RabbitMQ, Redis, Elasticsearch, InfluxDB, Kubernetes, Bitbucket Pipelines, ArgoCD, etc.;  Hosting: Digital Ocean, AWS (including serverless services like Lambda, SQS, SES, API Gateway, etc),Heroku, GCP/GKE, Cloudflare, etc.;  Local development: Docker.

title: Customer Service Agent (with knowledge of German)

details.description: Austrian Airlines search for Customer Service Agent (with knowledge of German) to join our professional team. Please note that it is not a remote work. Our service center is based in Lviv. Requirements:  Good command of written and spoken German.  Advanced computer skills.  Effective communication over the phone, through email etc.  Customer orientation.  Ability to learn fast.  Motivation for working and growing professionally.  Flexibility to work shifts.  Be ready to work in a team.  We are looking for active and friendly candidate, ready to help; who can work under pressure and is responsible and reliable. There will be an advantage if you have a previous experience in working with customers or in travel industry. Responsibilities:  Anticipate problems and needs of the customers.  Maintain the balance in between the customer‚Äôs concerns and business requirements.  Handle issues and complaints, provide solution to the customers.  Work in reservation system (make new bookings, rebookings etc.)  Provide information about the flight schedule, ticket prices and other travel-related requests.  Offer additional flight-related services defined by the policy of the airline.  Follow confidential agreement and GDPR.  Maintain high quality service over the phone and via e-mail.  Observe quality and quantity of personal and team goals.  Take part in coordination and communication within office representatives.  Working with us you will get:  Official employment in international company.  Full time employment and flexible schedule.  Paid apprenticeship.  On time salary and paid vacation.  Opportunity to influence on your income.  Carrier prospects.  Possibility of VIP Health Insurance.  Comfortable office.  Passionate and friendly team.
